description: MrHooker is a command-line tool for hooking function calls in Cython,using LD_PRELOAD. Hooks are written in Cython httpcython.org_ (a dialectof Python), and compiled on the fly. MrHooker will take care of setting up theenvironment, initialiing Python in the child process, and cleaning upafterwards.
longdescription: MrHooker is a command-line tool for hooking function calls in Cython,using LD_PRELOAD. Hooks are written in Cython httpcython.org_ (a dialectof Python), and compiled on the fly. MrHooker will take care of setting up theenvironment, initialiing Python in the child process, and cleaning upafterwards.
